thread.title: First Democratic Debate on Tue. Oct. 13, You guys tuning in?
thread.title_full: First Democratic Debate on Tue. Oct. 13, You guys tuning in?

author: Padawanbater2
title: First Democratic Debate on Tue. Oct. 13, You guys tuning in?
text: First Democratic Debate on Tue. Oct. 13, You guys tuning in? Discussion in ' Politics ' started by Padawanbater2 , Oct 12, 2015 . Page 1 of 20 Padawanbater2 Well-Known Member Any expectations, predictions? I think it'll be a lot more intimate and informative for the simple fact there are a lot less candidates to answer questions. Should be good, I think Sanders will come out on top. Harrekin Well-Known Member Padawanbater2 said: â†‘ Any expectations, predictions? I think it'll be a lot more intimate and informative for the simple fact there are a lot less candidates to answer questions. Should be good, I think Sanders will come out on top. Click to expand... The Hillary selection process will begin on that date? I'll watch it for the lulz. ChesusRice and spandy like this. TBoneJack Well-Known Member I'll be watching. I think both Hillary and Bernie will do OK. I don't expect any major risks or screw-ups by either of them in the first debate. They are both polished politicians. They will be civil toward one another, not wanting to seem "mean-spirited". Direct debate attacks will be reserved for later debates by the candidate who's behind at that time. Both will play it safe in the first debate, read the reaction/results over the next couple days, and make adjustments.
